column2: Job Title : Head - Shared Services Location:  Pune Accountable to : Emergys CEO Job Summary: This key leadership position will be the senior most Shared services leader in India for Emergys Enterprises. The leader will be accountable for Finance, Human Resources, Administration, and Legal functions for the various Emergys entities in India. The objective is to build a common consistent organizational framework, policies, procedures for the various Emergys entities and provide leadership to the functional leaders. The role will provide leadership and guidance to the functional leaders within the individual Business units to successfully run day to day operations. The ultimate goal of the role is to build a resilient shared services organization in India that is able to drive business growth locally in India and support an offshore business model for current and potential Emergys customers across North America, EMEA and Asia Pacific. Key Responsibilities: Strategic Leadership: Collaboratively build strategies to executive and support the growth aspirations of Emergys. Design, implement and operate an organization model that is able to support the business goals. Establish common and consistent policies that promote company culture and vision. Ensure alignment of local goals with organizational objectives. Drive innovative solutions and process improvements for the successful planning and execution of the Emergys global vision and strategy. Identify strategic improvement opportunities, and sponsor/lead/contribute to the critical improvement projects. Foster an environment that encourages sharing of ideas, information and best practices within the organization. Participate in M&A integration activities as needed. Provide strategic guidance to department heads and senior leadership on shared services initiatives and opportunities for improvement. Team Management: Accountable for building and inspiring a high performing team through ongoing development, performance management and coaching. Create an inclusive environment where different work styles, personalities and approaches are valued Oversee daily operations of the Finance, HR, Administration and legal functions in India Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to assess operational performance and identify areas for improvement. Finance and Business Responsibilities Ensure best practice business and finance principles, protocols, systems, and structures are in place, including the effective and efficient use of resources that align with the strategic objectives and principles of the organization. Oversee and lead the budgeting process including the establishment of organizational budgeting framework and reporting mechanisms. Oversee and lead the FP&A function including the establishment of organizational framework and reporting mechanisms. Negotiate and manage contracts with all external service providers. Contribute to the regular identification and reporting of risks. Inform the CEO of risks and mitigation strategies. Proactively identify and implement opportunities to improve the sustainability of the organization's funding, structure services and activities. Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, industry standards, and company policies in all shared services activities. Identify and mitigate risks related to shared services operations, implementing controls and safeguards as necessary. Vendor Management: Manage relationships with external service providers and vendors, ensuring that contracted services meet quality standards and are delivered in a timely and cost-effective manner. Negotiate contracts and agreements with vendors to optimize terms and pricing. Experience & Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, finance, accounting, or a related field; Master's degree preferred. Experience in executive role as Centre Head/Operations Head is preferred. Prior experience in leading a shared services function comprising Finance, HR, Admin and Legal. Outstanding organizational and leadership abilities Demonstrable competency in establishing a strategy and execution of the same. Demonstrated skills in effective communication with various internal and external stakeholders. Visionary leader who can shape the organizational culture to improve adoption of future state. Proven ability to foster team productivity and cohesiveness. Ability to manage complexity under pressure. Proven track record of people and project management. Strong in hiring, developing and evaluation of leaders.
column11: Shared Services, Business Services, Global Operations, Process Improvement, Hr Shared Services, Financial Operations

column2: Its never been a more exciting time to join Vistra.   At Vistra our purpose is progress. We believe that our clients have the power to change the world and to do great things for global progress, and we exist to remove the friction that comes from the complexity of global business  to help our clients achieve progress without friction.   But progress only happens when people come together and take action. And we??e absolutely committed to building a culture where our people can do just that . We have an exciting opportunity for you to join our team as  Operational Excellence Director India Operations,   based in our Vistra International Expansion (India) Private Limited, this full-time and permanent position is based in Mumbai, India and offers regional coverage, allowing you to make a significant impact to our Vistra Operational Excellence department and its growth.    Purpose of Role   The Operational Excellence Director is a senior-level strategic changemaker who plays a critical role within the global Operational Excellence team. This leader relentlessly champions continuous improvement and optimizes operational efficiency across the organization with a relentless sense of urgency. They collaborate extensively to identify and eliminate waste, streamline processes, and foster a culture of excellence all while driving rapid results. Key qualities and actions:  Senior-Level Leadership: Builds strong relationships, influences change with urgency, and challenges the status quo to achieve rapid improvements in productivity, efficiency, and profitability.  Results-Oriented: Leads by example and drives a culture of urgency for impactful results.  Continuous Improvement Champion: Champions quality and a continuous improvement mindset throughout the organization.  Strategic Collaboration: Collaborates extensively with regional and global teams to identify areas for improvement, develop data-driven solutions, and implement best practices.  Action-Oriented: Analyzes data, facilitates process mapping, designs streamlined workflows, and implements performance metrics with a focus on swift and impactful results. In essence, the Operational Excellence Director is a high-impact leader who thrives in a fast-paced environment. They are a catalyst for rapid improvement, driving operational excellence with a sense of urgency and a relentless focus on results.    Scope    Lead and implement operational excellence initiatives aligned with local, regional, and global goals, with a focus on delivering rapid and impactful results.  Analyze regional data to pinpoint areas for improvement and develop data-driven solutions that consider cultural and market nuances, working with a sense of urgency to address critical areas.   Key Responsibilities & Attributes Operations/Functional Responsibilities: Manages operational excellence initiatives across the organization, driving improvements in efficiency and productivity.  Analyzes key processes and identifies opportunities for enhancement. This includes streamlining workflows, optimizing technology utilization, and implementing improvements for both people and systems.  Collaborates with stakeholders to leverage technology for change management. Works closely with key decision-makers to ensure technology aligns with operational goals and acts as a bridge between departments to facilitate smooth adoption of new processes.  Plays a pivotal role in delivering strategic initiatives. Provides leadership and direction to ensure successful implementation of the group's strategic plans.  Builds strong relationships throughout the organization. Fosters open communication and collaboration at all levels to create a supportive environment for continuous improvement.   Take Ownership of: [WHY]  Owns the development and implementation of a regional operational excellence strategy aligned with global goals. This includes identifying priorities, allocating resources, and driving successful execution of initiatives.  Owns the identification and elimination of process inefficiencies within the region. This involves actively seeking out areas for improvement and leading cross-functional teams to develop solutions.  Owns the establishment and maintenance of a culture of continuous improvement within the region. This includes fostering employee engagement, promoting knowledge sharing, and recognizing achievements in operational excellence.  Owns the regional performance metrics for operational excellence. This encompasses setting targets, monitoring progress, and ensuring data-driven decision making for continuous improvement.  Owns staying informed about industry best practices and regional business nuances relevant to JASK This ensures the regional strategy leverages the latest advancements while considering cultural and market specificities. Be Accountable to: [WHAT]  limitations and advantages and translate these into business deliverables and change  Strategic Initiatives: Develop and implement operational excellence initiatives aligned with regional and global goals.  Process Optimization: Identify areas for improvement within the C region, conduct process mapping, and design streamlined workflows.  Data-Driven Improvement: Analyze data to identify regional pain points and develop data-driven solutions for process improvement.  Performance Management: Implement and manage performance metrics to track progress and measure success of operational excellence initiatives within the region.  Collaboration & Knowledge Sharing: Collaborate with cross-functional teams across JASK and the global Operational Excellence team. Champion a culture of continuous improvement by promoting best practices and knowledge sharing within the region.  Training & Development: Develop and deliver training programs to equip staff with operational excellence methodologies.  Regional Adaptability: Consider regional nuances while adapting and implementing global best practices for operational excellence.  Reporting & Insights: Monitor industry trends in operational excellence specific to the region, provide insights, and recommend necessary adjustments to regional strategies. P&L Responsibilities:  With the support of the Finance Business Partner, monitor financial information of initiative/s (OPEX, CAPEX and Benefits realization) People Management:  Manage team members (where applicable) in a professional team fashion including other teams and their management  Display behaviors such as flexibility to the changing needs of the business and communicating clearly and effectively to the various teams involved in initiatives Client Relationship:  Provide regular communication between business resources, stakeholders & management  Facilitate workshops and other forums in the identification and resolution of complex issues or new opportunities  Contribute and participate in team activities, e.g., meetings, planning, goal setting  Provide support to other team members in both debriefing and assisting in delivery of outputs  Coach and mentor resources assigned to initiatives and communicate expectations; plan, monitor and appraise results Others  Own your professional development  Support colleagues with transformational growth and operational excellence as and when required   Any other duties that from time to time may be considered appropriate by your line manager  Key requirements  Relevant Experience / Qualification / Knowledge / Skills   10+ years of experience in process improvement methodologies (e.g., Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen).  Experience leading and implementing operational excellence initiatives in a regional or cross-functional setting (preferred).  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field (preferred).  Certification in a process improvement methodology (e.g., Lean Six Sigma Green Belt or Black Belt) is a strong plus.  In-depth knowledge of data analysis techniques and tools for process improvement.  Familiarity with performance measurement frameworks and key performance indicators (KPIs).  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with diverse teams across cultures.  Project management skills to lead and execute operational excellence initiatives.  Excellent training and facilitation skills.  Strong data visualization and communication skills.  Cultural sensitivity and ability to adapt to diverse working styles. Company Benefits: At our Vistra India office, we believe in putting our employees well-being first! We offer a hybrid working arrangement.    Additionally, we provide attractive insurance benefits, excellent job exposure and career prospects. If you are excited about working with us, we encourage you to apply or have a confidential chat with one of our Talent Acquisition team members. Our goal is to make this a great place to work where all our people can thrive. We hope you join us on this exciting journey!
column11: Operational Excellence, Kaizen, Continuous Improvement, Process Improvement, Lean Six Sigma

column2: Event Manager Job Description   POSITION SUMMARY:   We are seeking an organized and detail-oriented individual to fill the role of Event Manager. This multifaceted position requires overseeing event planning and execution while also managing inventory and coordinating with vendors. The ideal candidate needs to be able to work under pressure, possess excellent communication skills, and demonstrate strong leadership abilities. Job description is intended to present a general list of tasks/duties performed by employees within this job classification. Job Description is not intended to reflect all duties performed within the job.     RESPONSIBILITIES : 1.  Event Planning and Execution :  - Plan, organize, and execute various events, including conferences, seminars, corporate gatherings along with pre-wedding and wedding events.  - Coordinate all aspects of event, including dcor, catering, audiovisual setup, and guest accommodations, hospitality and logistics.  - Develop and maintain event timelines, budgets, and schedules to ensure seamless execution.  - Oversee event setup and breakdown, ensuring all elements are in place and meet quality standards.   2.  Inventory Management :  - Maintain accurate inventory records of event-related materials, supplies, and equipment.  - Monitor inventory levels and anticipate supply needs to ensure sufficient stock for upcoming events.  - Coordinate with vendors to procure necessary inventory items, negotiate pricing, and track deliveries and provide regular updates to senior management.  - Conduct regular inventory audits to reconcile discrepancies and identify areas for improvement.   3.  Vendor Coordination :  - Establish and maintain relationships with vendors, including caterers, rental companies, audiovisual and other service providers.  - Communicate event requirements and expectations to vendors and ensure they deliver services in accordance with contracts and agreements.  - Negotiate pricing and terms with vendors to maximize value while staying within budget constraints.  - Address any issues or concerns that arise during the planning and execution phases and work proactively to find solutions.   4.  Team Leadership and Collaboration :  - Lead a team of event staff and volunteers, providing guidance, direction, and support throughout the planning and execution process.  - Collaborate with senior management, to align event objectives with broader organizational goals.  - Foster a positive and inclusive work environment that promotes creativity, teamwork, and professional growth.   QUALIFICATIONS : - Proven experience in event planning and management, preferably in a corporate or professional setting for at least two (2) years. - Strong organizational and project management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively. - Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities, with a customer service-oriented approach. - Proficiency in inventory management software and Microsoft Office Suite. - Ability to work flexible hours, including evenings, overnight and weekends, as needed.   Join our team and play a pivotal role in creating memorable and successful events while effectively managing inventory and vendor relationships. If you're passionate about event planning and thrive in a dynamic environment, we want to hear from you!   PERKS: - Travel allowance for events (recce, site visits, event setup and dismantle) is also provided separately. - Over and above the fixed monthly salary, we have an incentive model for our event manager. This model provides the manager to have a higher take home income, as per their quarterly performance.
column11: Event Planning, Time Management, Event Management, Resource Management, Communication Skills, Negotiation, Client Servicing

column2: Job Role:   Vice President Operations and Business Process Delivery  Location:  Nagpur  Schedule:  Full Time  Work Location:  On Site Job Summary:  As the Vice President of Business Process Delivery, you will be responsible for overseeing and optimizing operational processes to ensure efficiency, effectiveness, and client satisfaction. You will be responsible for managing day-to-day operations, implementing best practices, and driving continuous improvement initiatives to enhance service delivery and maximize business outcomes. Reports to:  Founder Duties and Responsibilities: Operational Management: Oversee and coordinate all operational activities within the Finance and Accounting Department Develop and implement operational strategies to streamline processes, improve productivity, and optimize resource utilization. Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and quality standards. Business Process Delivery: Lead the delivery of finance and accounting consulting services to clients, ensuring timely and high-quality deliverables. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and optimize business processes that align with client objectives and industry best practices. Monitor project progress, identify risks, and proactively address issues to ensure successful project delivery. Client Relationship Management: Serve as a primary point of contact for clients, addressing their inquiries, managing expectations, and fostering strong relationships. Gather client feedback and insights to continuously improve service offerings and exceed client expectations. Identify opportunities for upselling or expanding service offerings based on client needs and industry trends. Team Leadership and Development: Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to the accounting and finance team. Foster a collaborative and supportive work environment, encouraging professional growth and development among team members. Conduct performance evaluations, set goals, and provide constructive feedback to drive individual and team success. Continuous Improvement: Drive a culture of continuous improvement by identifying inefficiencies, implementing process enhancements, and leveraging technology solutions. Monitor industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices to stay ahead of the curve and adapt operations accordingly. Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure operational performance and track progress over time. Skills and qualifications :  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Accounting, or a related field; MBA or relevant professional certification (e.g., CA, CPA, CMA) preferred. Proven experience in operations management, business process improvement, and consulting within the finance and accounting industry. Strong understanding of finance and accounting principles, processes, and systems. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in project management tools, ERP systems, and the Microsoft Office suite. Strategic thinker with a results-oriented mindset and a commitment to delivering exceptional client service. Trivium Management Services is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.  When you join the Trivium family, you become a member of its global community. Weve been a place to gather and connect since 2009. column2: The Assistant Manager-CI will be responsible f      or continuous improvement initiatives within our organization. Working closely with the Continuous Improvement Manager & will assist in analysing processes, identifying improvement opportunities, and facilitating the execution of improvement projects. This role requires a combination of analytical skills, project management capabilities, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.                        Principle Duties and Responsibilities                         Process Analysis Support: Assist in analyzing current processes across various departments to identify inefficiencies, waste, and areas for improvement. Utilize data analysis techniques to identify trends, patterns, and root causes of issues.                  Project Coordination: Support the planning, execution, and monitoring of continuous improvement projects. Coordinate project activities, track milestones, and ensure timely completion of project deliverables.                  Data Collection and Reporting: Assist in gathering relevant data related to process performance, quality metrics, and key performance indicators (KPIs). Compile and analyze data to generate reports, dashboards, and presentations for management review.                  Continuous Improvement Tools and Methodologies: Learn and apply continuous improvement methodologies such as Lean, Six Sigma, or Kaizen to support improvement initiatives. Assist in facilitating workshops, brainstorming sessions, and problem-solving activities with cross-functional teams.                  Training and Education: Support the development and delivery of training programs related to continuous improvement methodologies, tools, and techniques. Provide guidance and support to employees on implementing improvement initiatives within their respective areas.                  Documentation and Standardization: Assist in documenting updated standard operating procedures (SOPs), work instructions, and best practices resulting from process improvements. Ensure documentation is standardized, accessible, and regularly updated.                  Quality Assurance Support: Collaborate with quality assurance teams to ensure that process improvements comply with regulatory requirements and quality standards. Participate in quality audits and inspections as needed.                  Change Management: Assist in managing change associated with process improvements, including stakeholder engagement, communication, and resistance management. Help foster a culture of continuous improvement throughout the organization.                  Cross-functional collaboration: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including operations, engineering, quality, and supply chain, to align continuous improvement efforts with organizational goals. Communicate progress, challenges, and recommendations to stakeholders as needed.                  Responsible for process design and Facility planning for New Process development. (New Product)                              Knowledge, Skills and Abilities                         Familiarity with continuous improvement methodologies such as Lean, Six Sigma, or Kaizen. Certification (e.g., Six Sigma Green Belt, Black belt) is desirable.                  Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, analyze, and interpret data from various sources.                  Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite, with advanced skills in Excel and PowerPoint for data analysis and reporting.                  Excellent organizational and project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously.                  Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse teams and stakeholders.                  Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality of work.                  Adaptability and willingness to learn and grow in a dynamic environment.                                    Education and Experience                         Bachelors degree in mechanical engineering.                  6 -8 years of experience in a related role, preferably in process improvement, project management, or operations.                  Familiarity with relevant industry standards, codes and regulations.                  Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on accuracy and precision in R&D.                  Ability to manage multiple task simultaneously and work in a fast-paced environment.                              Physical Demands                               To successfully perform the essential functions of this job.                              Required daily to stand, sit, walk, talk, hear, and see (specific close vision abilities are required to perform computer work).                              Required occasionally to stoop, kneel, crouch and crawl.                              Required regularly to travel (usually by air or road so may be required to sit for extended periods), specifically to support other sites referenced in this description. Travel approximately 10-20%.                              Required daily to use hands and fingers and arms to reach (to operate a computer and telephone).                              Required occasionally to lift and/or move objects that are light to moderate.                                    Working Conditions                         Ability to work with moderate noise (i.e., business office with computers, phone, and printers, etc.)                      Ability to work in an open planned office / individual office                  Ability to sit at a computer terminal for extended periods                  Ability to sit in a car or on a plane for extended periods

column1: C E O - Operations - Alloy Steel  ( Casting Plant )
column2: Casting Unit is a Top-end Global player in the steel Alloy casting industries, with focus on Power and Energy and Oil & Gas  ,  Defence Sectors   Applications.   Job Responsibilities :- Foundry Operations / Business Development / Project Management / New product development /QA-QC/Vendor development/Customer support/ Inspection/Material management. General Management, Business Development, Project Management, Retailing, Operational Excellence.   Foundry Operations :- Experience in developing components for Oil & Gas, Power, Steel, Sugar, Cement, Earth moving, Transportation, Mining, Pump and Engineering industries. Ensuring the sales and marketing along with operations of Plant operations (Forging/Machining/Die shop & advanced machine shop, NPD & Marketing). Responsible for India P&L including all operations in the country viz. Sales, Operations, Procurement, Supply chain, and support functions.    Well versed with International Standards like ASME, ASTM, BS, DIN, EN, ISO & IBR. Experienced in driving the organization for profitability and growth. Setting functional goals, KRAs and deriving road maps for achieving them. Able in strategic decision making. Data driven management. Significant exposure in development and manufacturing of castings in Carbon Steel, Stainless Steel, Low Alloys steel, Duplex & Super Duplex Steels, Creep resistant steel and Nickel based Castings weight range upto 15T single piece. Sound knowledge of reading drawings & Engineering (Method), simulation, NDT and inspection.    Well versed with International Standards like ASME, ASTM, BS, DIN, EN, ISO & IBR. Significant exposure in handling activities including pattern development, methoding, planning, scheduling & implementing plant capacity enhancement activities, molding, casting processing, NDT, inspection, techno-commercial activities, vendor development, purchase management, plant and equipment maintenance,EHS and QMS, productivity improvement, Lean management. An effective communicator with honed interpersonal, planning, problem solving, leadership and motivational skills. Proficient in appraising the prevalent production systems/ processes, identifying loopholes if any and undertaking result-oriented measures for alleviating them and documenting the same. Hands-on experience in enhancing production process operations, optimizing resource & capacity utilization and escalating productivity & operational efficiencies while curtailing costs & expenses. Overseeing activities from conceptualization to execution including finalization of technical specifications, technical drawing, procurement / supply of raw materials, tooling, planning and scheduling, stage inspections, progress monitoring & resource planning. Leading product development as per defined specifications; Methoding, tooling design, validation of simulation, undertaking testing / inspection.   Foreseeing performance bottlenecks and taking corrective & preventive measures to avoid the same. Deploying various methodologies for analysing processes, recommending modifications to minimize rework & rejection for realizing operational efficiencies, control costs and cycle-time. Streamlining system and operational procedures for effective resource management.  Establishing manufacturing quality standards, methods, facilities policies, and  Procedures. Analysing function wise costs and executing cost saving techniques / measures  and modifications to achieve substantial reduction in expenditures. Identifying and developing potential vendors for achieving cost effective purchases of materials; reduction in prices & timely delivery; conducting tests & inspections to ensure operational effectiveness of products developed. Going through P&L regularly and taking necessary steps on the operational functions for improvement. New Product Development :-   Gating system calculation for New / Existing product.   Developing Production Parts Approval Process (PPAP) for new parts / modified parts    Working in close coordination with vendors by providing technical guidance and deployment of quality plan for delivering good parts on time.   Planning and conducting process audits at vendors end, vendor up-gradation and rejection control through various tools.   Understanding overall operations for improvement of existing products with thrust on reducing product cost and based on market trends / requirements.   Coordinating entire product development functions including requirement analysis, finalizing   specifications, designing, proto type development and testing activities   Designing and developing new products as per the specification of clients. Process   Control :-   Ensuring the process by controlling the sand parameter, paint viscosity and mould hardness and closing and other controls related to process. P & L and Costing :-   Assisting with Accounts for calculation of P & L, Costing and the material consumption of the month. Process Knowledge :-   Foundry Operations   Gating system   ( Methoding ) calculation for   new / Existing product   Problem solving with seven Q. C tools & 8D method   6 Sigma (Black Belt).   NDT   ( ASNT level 2 )   Basic Knowledge in Heat Treatment and metallurgy   Process control   SAP PP module, PRT module and Sales module   Tooling estimation Key Result Areas :-   Profitability and growth of the foundry business.   Set goals for different work centers, derive road maps and inspire the team to achieve the same.   Improve productivity of different work centers.   Cost analysis and drive cost reduction projects.   Improve on-time delivery.   Data analysis and drive improvement plans.   Take strategic decision for the growth and sustainability of the business.   Enhance customer satisfaction.   Ensure necessary system in place for all activities.   Lead the new development projects.   Technical review of customer enquiries, and comment on feasibility.   Suggest design modification if required. (co-engineering with customers)   Approving technology drawing and procedures.   Design of gating system, riser system and other aspects of methoding.   Review Simulation and modifying the design if required.   Set the process requirements.   Review the customer specification and ensure that castings are meeting the specified requirements   Estimate, plan and review the output of different work centers.   Cost estimation.   Organizing review meetings.   Ensure Conducting internal and supplier audits and implementation of quality management system.   Ensuring adherence to quality systems.   Training and motivating the team members.   Competency mapping of employees.   Conduct and review performance appraisals.   Implement lean manufacturing concepts.   Implement 5S. Coordinate with Clients / Vendors for close out of all Techno commercial issues. Technical support to Sales, Production & Quality.  Resolving customer complaints, carrying out analysis for root cause and taking corrective & preventive actions Assessing & approving manufacturing inspection & testing plans / ITP/ NDE procedures & technical documentation. Identifying: Customer requirements / qualification procedures and implementing process control approach. Improvement opportunities based on best practices, benchmarking and working towards them. Identify, analyze & resolve significant commercial & technical issues related to executed projects. Strengths:-     Ability to independently run a midsize Corporate Entity with overall perspective. Strong on Financial Management, Commercials, Taxation. Strong Analytic Ability, & Negotiation Skills. Good Communication, Motivational & Oratorical Skills. Strong on PR & Relationship Management.

Designated as the Management Representative of ISO 9001:2000 Quality System Provide leadership to position the company at the forefront of the industry. Oversee company operations to insure production efficiency, quality, service, and cost-effective management of resources.    Key Skills :-   A. Formulate business strategies, long term growth plans, short term growth plans and policy making.  B. Develop and deliver companys strategic plans in the most effective and efficient manner.  C. Accountable for the overall performance of the Comp-any and day to day running and management of business under the delegated authority from the board.   RESPONSIBILITIES OF CEO :-   Strategies & Vision :-   1. Formulate growth strategies and vision for the organization.  2. Define mission and road map to realize the vision.  3. To scan global business scenario and develop long term and short term strategic plan.  Operations :-   1. Develop and present strategic and annual business plans for approval.  2. Implement strategies, making major corporate decision, managing operations and resources of company in the most efficient and effective to achieve companys objectives.  3. Making key decisions for products and services, differentiators, corporate communication.  4. Develop and implement risk management plan.  5. Ensure appropriate internal audit procedures and processes in place.     Organization Development :-   1. Ensure that there is a fit between strategy & culture, and companys processes and structure.  2. Leadership role in establishing and developing companys culture and values.  3. Manage, motivate, develop and lead the members of management team  4. Ensure that there is a succession plans in place.   New Opportunity Identification :-   1. To map business scenario and emerging opportunities to identify new avenues for growth.  2. Sourcing of new mines and minerals resources, both in India and globally.     Managing Environment :-   1. To manage the competitive intelligence gathering system to get critical competitor information for benchmarking and effective decision making.  2. To manage and influence supportive government policy formulation for the benefit of industry.  3. To ensure that the organization and its programmes, products and services are consistently presents in strong and positive manner to the relevant stockholders, creating positive image.   Process Validation :-    Analyzing various processes / applications and recommending modifications to enhance operational efficiency. Devising cost saving measures & modifications to achieve substantial reduction in terms of man-days, production cost, raw material & energy consumption.   Testing / Inspection/ Quality :-   Testing of the methods to ensure that they are precise, reproducible, "fool-proof" and specific to the product. Developing standards for Inspection of materials. development and maintenance of Quality Management System.   Project Management :-   Planning, estimating & scheduling projects involving detailed engineering activities, finalization of requirements and specifications. Supervising the analysis of results / data & preparing project reports.    Metallurgical Operations :-   Studying process and suggesting development of components with respect to metallurgical inputs. Preparing process flow chart and control plan for development components. Strengthening the existing vendor source.   Competencies Required :-   1. Technically sound & through knowledge of steel making process  2. Analytical ability  3. Negotiation skills  4. Communication skills  5. Decision making  6. Risk taking abilit      Functional Skills :-   Project & Process / Methods   Management  Research & Development   Metallurgical Operations  Product Development   Material Sourcing  Supplier Quality Management   Raw Material Conversion  Testing & Inspection   Failure & Rejection Analysis  Process Enhancement   Material Standardization  Corrective & Preventive Actions   P&L activities  Cost Reductions   Reverse Engineering  Continuous Improvement   Liaison / Coordination   Computer Skilled :-   Computer usage for Performance monitoring: Developed periodical performance monitoring system through SAP/ERP/ Oracle with extensive use of computers at all levels.    Quality Management Systems :-   Implementation of ISO-10006, ISO- 50001, ISO- 9000, ISO- 9001, ISO- 2008, EMS 14001, OHAS -18001 systems. TPM, WCM,    Qualification:  B.E./B.Tech. Metallurgy / IIT (Metallurgy/+ MBA (Operations /Marketing) from Premier Institutes

Preparation of Mining Plan for approval of Indian Bureau of Mines (Govt. Of Oman)  Planning the mining layout roads for truck movement waste dumps, water drainage etc as well as returning the mining site to its natural state after the deposits have been exhausted. Monitoring the Production status, procedures & systems followed in production to ensure compliance norms with desired quality and quantity as per target. Obtaining NOC or Registrations or Approvals or Licenses from respective govt. bodies or local authorities and responsible for Statutory Compliance Management. Identifying gaps areas, creating modules and delivering strategic management developmental programmes. Work with training team to develop training programs basis process requirements for performance improvement. Work with the knowledge management team to ensure timely delivery of training content and knowledge base articles basis process requirements. Any experience with animals (volunteers, neighbourhood animals, etc) is a big plus.      5. Fluency in English is a must, fluency in Hindi not required but a plus.      Personal attributes 1. Excellent organizational and analytical skills      2. Able to see the big picture but also focusing on the details, keeping aligned the long-term strategy with the      3. Excellent interpersonal and communication skill, able to work with people from different background and      4. Results-driven, able to make and suggest well-inform decisions      5. Empathy towards animals and understanding the work of Animal Aid

column2: Role & Responsibilities   Responsible for monitoring standardized processes for administration/operations of given departments. Evaluate current operations practices for optimal efficiancy and implement improvements as required. Identify and implement performance improvements, with the ability to effectively initiate organizational change. To oversee and manage the pan-departmental non medical operations including Maintenance, Housekeeping, Pharmacy, Customer issues, documents and records, inventory, downtime analysis, resources allocations and optimal utilizations etc. To monitor the pharmacy operations, inventory, optimal utilization of resources, employ best practices for maximum revenue generation. To take regular hospital rounds to establish perfect rapport with the ground staff, to oversee the ground activities and operations, and to random check operations. Identifies utilization issues, sharing findings with applicable teams as appropriate to facilitate system optimization. Develops and oversees implementation and administration of internal policies and procedure in conjunction with Unit Head. Interprets applicable laws, rules and regulations and ensures the practice is in compliance with same. To conduct periodical meetings of all the department heads to discuss various issues pertain to the organization; and conduct relevant departments meeting to resolves issues relevant to them To maintain all the legal records, licenses and approvals and monitor their validity and act on their timely renewals Provide effective team and project management duties, including overseeing project completion timelines, monitoring project costs, and ensuring patient needs are met. Liaise with other departments, including finance and marketing, to ensure operations budgets and proper advertisements which meet department goals and attract clients. Maintain strong relationships with any third-parties (vendors, financial institutions, suppliers) the department works with regularly to ensure smooth procurement and delivery of products and services. Provide outstanding leadership to team members, including opportunities for coaching and development, to maximize work output and work quality. Identify patterns and problem areas, and implement effective solutions to increase efficiency. Take decisions with consultation with GM on matters relating to the day to day hospital operation within their defined work area including the strategic planning of resources. Confirm that performance quality/outcomes scorecards and benchmarking activities are in place and that the operations team utilizes this data to make improvements in clinical and business operations. Transforms key concepts of service excellence and satisfaction into actionable programs and quality metrics that can be standardized Work with quality department for different internal & external audits. Involve in different academic accreditations like CGHS, IDCCM, DNB etc. Design and implement internal safety audits & safety department work in relation to all government rules & regulations. Develop budget for the department and allocate funds within budget limit to accomplish objectives. Monitors variance against budget on an ongoing basis. Ensure preparation of annual Operating and Capital budgets for assigned departments in coordination with Unit Head. Monitors monthly reports of assigned departments and investigates budget variances. Submits explanations of budget variances and contingency plans to Unit Head Collaborate with department management to develop financial plans. Analyze financial data and work to maximize revenue and reduce costs. Supervise all company financial activities and negotiate budgets, contracts and agreements
column11: Operations

column1: Senior Manager_Ent Arch & IT Op Model
column2: Responsible for the      development of business target operating model and blueprint of organization      representing     how it operates.                              Manage      overall architectural, strategic direction, and the day-to-day operation of the company s technology     and business     portfolio capabilities with defined SLAs and commitments.                             Review and streamline the existing      technology     portfolio to improve efficiency, reduce complexity,      and lower the total cost of ownership (TCO).                             Design, plan, and implement changes to the environment consistent with company s strategic direction and the goal of standardization.                             Recruit, train, develop, and evaluate staff in support of functional area needs and expectations. Responsible for the day-to-day direction and leadership of external/ offshore technology team members.                             Participate with overall     Business and      IT leadership team to define      integrated     strategy across the entire      organization     including risk assessments and roadmaps.                             Lead and manage a team of      enterprise and      solution architects, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to drive performance and professional development.                             Collaborate with sales teams to understand client requirements and develop tailored solutions that address their business challenges.                             Work closely with product development teams to ensure alignment between client needs and product capabilities.                             Lead the development of comprehensive solution architectures that encompass technology, processes, and people to deliver business value.                             Drive innovation and continuous improvement within the solution architecture practice, staying abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends.                             Partner with project management teams to ensure successful implementation and delivery of solutions, providing oversight and guidance throughout the project lifecycle.                             Serve as a trusted advisor to clients, building strong relationships and      providing     strategic guidance on technology solutions.                             Develop and      maintain     documentation, including solution designs, technical specifications, and architectural diagrams.                                 Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:                                 Business Acumen - Understands how business works; knows the competition; knowledgeable in current and      possible future     policies, practices, trends, technology; and information affecting his/her business and organization. Uses data information to improve service, and acts with customer in mind. Understands the organization s mission, values, operations, and goals.                             Results Oriented - Can be counted on to exceed goals successfully. Steadfastly pushes self, partners, and others for results. Able to define, measure, and report meaningful measures of service and process effectiveness.                             Process Orientation -      TOGAF     certification or equivalent. Uses practices, processes, and systems to manage work and to simplify and use resources efficiently and effectively. Drives change through process design and implementation.                              Vendor Management - Able to develop relationships and define processes and services with vendors and partners. Able to develop metrics that measure the value contributed by partners and hold them      accountable for results.                              Develops Direct Reports -      Establishes     clear directions, delegates workload appropriately, and is a clear communicator. Holds frequent development discussions; constructs compelling development plans and executes them; will take on those who need help and further development; is a people builder.                             Planning and Organization - Sets      objectives     and goals; breaks down work into the process steps;      anticipates     and adjusts for problems and roadblocks. Can gather resources (people, funding, material, support) to get things done. Use resources effectively and efficiently.                             Team Oriented - Promotes and      facilitates     coordination and cooperation among peers.                              Peer Relationships - can quickly find common ground and solve problems for the good of all. Can      represent     his/her own interests and yet be fair to other groups. Can influence others and solve problems with peers with a minimum of noise. Encourages collaboration and is effective at owning a process that spans groups of stakeholders.                             Decision Making - Makes good decisions based upon a mixture of analysis, wisdom,      experience     and judgment.      Considers     the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most      appropriate one     . Sought out by others for advice and solutions. Able to prioritize activities and set goals and milestones.                             Technical Learning - Understands all components of IT infrastructure and how they support the business; is good at learning industry, company, product, or technical knowledge developments.                                 Presentation and Communication Skills - Effectively communicates complex and technical issues to diverse audiences with clarity and conciseness; commands attention and can manage group process during a presentation.                                                   Qualifications     :                           Bachelor s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field;      Master s     degree preferred.                             Proven experience (1     0     -1     2     years) in      a     enterprise architecture role, with      demonstrated         expertise     in designing and delivering complex, enterprise-level solutions.                             Strong leadership and management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate a team to achieve excellence.                             Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and engage with clients at all levels.                             In-depth knowledge of enterprise architecture principles, methodologies, and best practices.                             Experience working with a variety of technologies and platforms, including cloud computing, data analytics,     integration platforms     and enterprise applications.                             Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen attention to detail.                             Relevant certifications (e.g., TOGAF, AWS Certified Solutions Architect) are a plus.

column2: Business Transformation Associate Director-Functional and Process Excellence Skill required:  Operations Excellence - Business Transformation Designation:  Management Level - Associate Director Job Location:  Hyderabad Qualifications:  Any Graduation/Master of Business Administration Years of Experience:  18 to 28 years What would you do? "You will be aligned with our Functional and Process Excellence vertical and help us provide consulting support to solve for strategic and operational business problems for our global clients leveraging Transformation methodologies and assets. You will be working as a part of Operations Excellence team which drives continuous improvement projects and interact with client or internal stakeholders to drive and influence improvement objectives. This team is responsible for breaking down the end to end process to identify automation/improvement opportunities and create automation/transformation road-maps. This team is also responsible for delivering large scale end-to-end process transformation projects for global clients. In this role, you will be expected to develop transformation vision, assess vision feasibility and capability gaps, plan journey management. Also, translate economic trends into industry competitive advantage, transform a business to enable profitable & sustainable growth." What are we looking for? "Business Transformation Adaptable and flexible Problem-solving skills Ability to establish strong client relationship " Roles and Responsibilities "This role requires proactive identification, definition and solving of complex problems that have impact on the direction of the business or work effort, where analysis of situations requires an in-depth knowledge of Accenture It requires development and execution of strategy to achieve key business objectives in area of responsibility Interaction is with senior management levels at a client and/or within Accenture, involving negotiation or influencing on critical matters Individual should have wide latitude in decision making and determination of objectives and approaches to critical assignments Decisions have a major and lasting impact on areas outside of own responsibility Individual manages large complex teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts" Qualificationunavailable

column2: At IBM, we know that transformation drives change, and it is in our DNA to continuously transform. Our Business Transformation Consultants help drive large scale change that spans IBM business units and geographies. As a part of this team, you will have the unique opportunity to be a part of driving IBM's ongoing transformation as a company that continuously innovates and leads the market. Your Role and Responsibilities As a Continuous Improvement (CI)Lead, the person would be aligned to an account or cluster of accounts Work with delivery team, rest of CI Automation team and client to build and drive Transformation agenda for that client involving cluster of projects driving cost of operations and other business outcomes through E2E process re-engineering automation Build Lean Six Sigma DNA by conducting lean six sigma training, mentoring and certifying lean, YB and GB projects Identifying and Leading high impact Black Belt projects on various CTQs like Quality, Productivity etc and closing Support new transitions from Quality to implement Business Process Management System (BPMS) to ensure process performance measurement framework is created and operational Implement internal Quality Control Management Framework with the help of Quality Auditors and Quality Focal. Responsibilities include daily auditing of transactions as per the agreed approach with client, conducting RCA, identifying and implementing CAPAs to ensure Quality scores are with in SLA target Effective Visual Management on the floor Process operational risks assessment of critical processes by conducting FMEA or other process risks assessments and also, propose required controls Any short medium term project or initiative(s) linked to business priorities Required Technical and Professional Expertise 10-12 Years of relevant work experience in below mentioned areas Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Master Black belt from recognized organization Institute Identifying and Leading high impact Black Belt projects on various CTQs like Quality , Productivity etc and closing Ability to build and lead Transformation Roadmap involving different type of projects- process related, Tech automation, Target operating model etc. Identification of improvement opportunities by conducting E2E Value Stream Mapping (VSM) workshops involving cross-functional teams Sound knowledge of Lean and six sigma and application of the same in F&A ,R&C and T&T processes Ability to work with cross functional teams Experience of managing change management on his/ her own without much support Knowledge of various RPA solutions available in the market, handling of RPA Desktop automation assessments and implementing E2E solutions Conducting Lean and Six Sigma training to operations team Coaching Mentoring lean, YB and GB projects Innovative Visual Management on the floor Strong client facing and presentation skill Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Finance and Accounts background and knowledge of P2PR2RO2C,Banking,KYC and AML Working directly with executive level leaders Strong analytical and problem solving skills Good Interpersonal Skills Business knowledge acumen and quickly able to learn new things Strong priority setting, initiative and follow-through

You will be aligned with our Functional and Process Excellence vertical and help us provide consulting support to solve for strategic and operational business problems for our global client's leveraging Transformation methodologies and assets. column2: The Associate Manager, Process Design is a strategic and critical role impacting customer experience. PhonePe caters to various segments of customers through the diverse product offerings.      The Associate Manager leads and guides a team of process designers who lay the foundation for the exceptional experience each of those customers have while interacting with the support org.      The role focuses on impact by helping the team identify the apt problem statements, ensure effective analysis and execution.      The Associate manager is also key to collaborating with stakeholders for the overall progress of the CX Org        Role Expectations:(KPIs/KRAs of the role)          Streamline    - Assist specialists to streamline their work responsibilities with focus on prioritization and time management. Help specialists adhere to timelines by improving efficiency and structure of BAU operations        Process flows    - Take 100% ownership of process flows designed by the team. This should include        An organized and structured approach towards Process flow/ BOT flow creation, Review and Completion.          Org wide metric trends    - Grip on org wide metric movements with the intend to        Stay ahead in identifying trends and RCAs      Identify customer experience opportunities          Partnership -    Build a strong partnership with various stakeholders with the intend to        Understand the contribution of specialists, feedback, address escalations etc.      Improve the visibility / availability / approachability of the PD team          Communication    - Device a strong communication plan to cascade the progress and contributions made by PD. This will include effective utilization of existing forums like WBR, MBR and also, explore the need for additional channels/forums        BCP    - Device mechanisms to address BCP. This should cater to challenges caused due to increased dependency on specific individuals, lack of documentation, unavailability of a single repository for PD        People development    - Identify through conversations and evaluation mechanisms        The skill development needs for each team member. Explore the feasibility of providing the necessary opportunities within the team/company. Eg, project opportunities, mentorship programs, learning programs, courses, workshops etc      Identify low performers early on to provide adequate documented feedback, coaching, mentorship etc Prepare a robust performance management structure within the team          PD Metrics -    Co-own the quarterly/half-yearly and annual goals and roadmaps for PD. Play an active role in setting the goal, choosing the direction and preparing the roadmap for the same. This should also include assistance in execution, tracking and communication        CX-wide innovations -    Equip self to understand the industry benchmarks, innovations, best practices, technologies etc to play the role of an influencer in the road ahead for CX        Employee engagement and NPS -    Play an active role in nurturing the positive atmosphere within the team where every employee feels empowered, is evaluated fairly and has the opportunity to thrive      Experience, Skills, Qualifications:        Experience          2+ years of managing a team, preferably one which has process excellence/customer experience as the core deliverable      Hand-on experience of leading projects end-to-end      Must have actively handled performance management and conducted appraisal cycles discussions          Skills            People management    - Strong people skills to guide, mentor and scale Specialists with emphasis on specialists excellence in core job and professional development              Process management    - Ability to see the ecosystem as one and ensure effectiveness in prioritization and delivery from the specialists              Project management    - Ability to identify high impact problem statements, initiate execution, and drive to closure              Stakeholder managemen    t - Build strong relationship with stakeholders for self and the team              Communication    - Effective communication to represent the team, the deliverables, case studies etc. Adept at filtering out the noise              Advanced analytical skills    - Ability to do independent analysis and arrive at conclusions                Accountability    - Competent to take the ownership of team s functioning, specialist performance, team s development, process excellence              Goal driven    - Natural inclination to pick high impact, audacious goals. Guide and Inspire the team to execute          Qualifications        Graduate              For internal consensus/validations:            Preferred Industry/Sectors:(To be discussed prior to the hiring req approval process)              Internet / Fintech / Banking / eCommerce                  Growth Road Map:(for verbal discussions with candidates)        Organic Path: Assistant Manager -.> Manager -> Senior manager      Other Opportunities - Internal movements post 18 months in the role                  PhonePe Full Time Employee Benefits (Not applicable for Intern or Contract Roles)            Insurance Benefits -      Medical Insurance, Critical Illness Insurance, Accidental Insurance, Life Insurance          Wellness Program -      Employee Assistance Program, Onsite Medical Center, Emergency Support System          Parental Support -      Maternity Benefit, Paternity Benefit Program, Adoption Assistance Program, Day-care Support Program          Mobility Benefits -      Relocation benefits, Transfer Support Policy, Travel Policy          Retirement Benefits -      Employee PF Contribution, Flexible PF Contribution, Gratuity, NPS, Leave Encashment          Other Benefits -      Higher Education Assistance, Car Lease, Mobile Broadband Reimbursements, Salary Advance Policy

column2: The Global Real Estate (GRE) division manages all services related to buildings, workplaces and logistical services within the Deutsche Bank Group. This includes the search for new locations, the negotiation and management of rental agreements, the planning and implementation of construction projects and moves, as well as building operations with all aspects of facility management. The role would be part of the RE Oversight Operational Excellence function. The role works closely with all GRE functions - Real Estate, Projects and Facility Management to drive consistency, process improvement and compliance within the function globally Your key responsibilities Worldwide implementation of policies, processes and quality controls Develop, update and refine policies, key operational documents and playbooks. Implement appropriate risk management and compliance controls across the GRE workspace; Process optimization: Identification and evaluation of existing processes in order to identify weak points and optimization potential, e.g. reducing complexity Continuous Improvement: Develop and implement strategies to continuously improve real estate strategy, transaction and governance processes Quality management ensuring compliance with quality standards, controls and guidelines Training and Development: Develop resources to continuously train regional teams on new and existing processes. Innovation & Thought Leadership: Tracking industry trends, coordinating with partnerships to identify best practice and innovation and implementing it in GRE Risk & Compliance Management: Monitoring and compliance with regulations and controls. Supporting audit activities, coordination between teams and group audit, testing controls and process consistency and the correct implementation of policies Your skills and experience Stakeholder Management: Develops, promotes and maintains strong, productive working relationships at senior levels and within the GRE Service Delivery Platform. Experience in one or more professional/technical areas relevant to Global Real Estate Analytical and problem-solving skills, knowledge of financial management, strategic skills Very good communication skills and relationship management, very good knowledge of the English language, both spoken and written Ability to work in a rapidly evolving environment Communication Skills: Required to communicate with all stakeholders and be able to build consensus Presentation skills: You must be able to present current topics succinctly both orally and in Powerpoint Education:  Bachelor's or Master's degree or MBA (or comparable degree) from a recognized college or university (or comparable institution)

column2: Understand and create standardized process flows using BPMN standards.      Identify opportunities to optimize end-to-end processes across the organization as per BPMN standards.      Perform an assurance exercise in reviewing the maps created by the Leads, to ensure it is as per the requirement.      Collaborate with internal teams to ensure that control measures are effectively integrated into daily process flows.      Monitor and report on the effectiveness of controls, making recommendations for improvements as needed.      Prepare regular reports on process mapping, risk exposure, and control effectiveness for senior management.      Conduct trend analysis to anticipate potential challenges and propose preventive measures.      Work closely with risk leaders across each business to understand business processes and assess inherent risks.      Work with the risk team, in identifying the controls that cover the identified risks and ensure implementation.      Design and implement robust control frameworks to mitigate identified risks.      Establish feedback mechanisms to gather insights for refining processes and controls.      Drive a culture of continuous improvement intiatives, encouraging proactive identification of opportunities for enhancement.      Engagement with stakeholders across the Organization including senior and middle management for driving the initiatives.      Observe and provide regular updates on the status of ongoing initiatives.      Co-ordinate to ensure the implementation of reviewed and revised processes and controls by the respective stakeholders.        Competencies and Experience        bachelors degree in Business administration, Finance, Information Technology, or a relevant field. masters degree will be a plus.      10 to 12 years of experience with minimum 6 to 8 years as a Business Process Analyst or in a similar role.      Strong understanding of business process management and notation (BPMN) methodologies is required.      Working knowledge in BPM tools will be a plus (eg, IBM Blueworks, Aris, Igraffx).      Proficiency and certification in process modeling and analysis techniques is required (eg, BPMN, Six Sigma, Lean).      In-depth knowledge about work/process standardization, risk identification and controls.      Experience with process automation, workflow management, or business process management systems is preferred.      Knowledge of agile methodologies and project management principles will be an added advantage.        Benefits       3 days of additional leaves on above statutory requirement along with 2 days of voluntary leaves to pursue the CSR      initiatives          Business related certification expense reimbursement      Comprehensive Medical Assurance coverage for dependents Parents      Cab transport for staff working in UK US shift      Accidental Life cover 3 times of concerned CTC

column1: Senior Manager / AVP - Business Operations : Naukri.com
column2: Info Edge is Indias leading consumer internet company known for its strong brands in recruitment (naukri.com, naukrigulf.com, iimjobs.com, and firstnaukri.com), real estate (99acres.com), matrimony (Jeevansathi.com) and education (shiksha.com).  Starting with a classified recruitment online business, naukri.com, the Company has grown and diversified rapidly, setting benchmarks as a pioneer for others to follow either through setting up of in-house brands or through the route of strategic investments and acquisitions. Zomato.com, policybazaar.com & Happily Unmarried Marketing Private Limited are our investee companies to name a few out of many. With years of experience in the domain, strong cash flow generation and a diversified business portfolio, Info Edge is one of the very few profitable pure play internet companies in the country.  These are exciting times for Info Edge as we continue to grow in all our businesses, and continue to scale newer heights. We are investing across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to increase our predictive powers on customer behavior and continuously optimize and improve our systems.  At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. Driven by innovation, an experienced and talented leadership team and a strong entrepreneurial orientation, we pride ourselves on having a culture that promotes meritocracy. Our numerous milestones can largely be credited to an incredibly smart team working in an environment that encourages creativity and going the extra mile to develop products that people love to use and add value to our clients.  Key Responsibilities  :  Identifying areas of initiatives , creating customer business Impact and improvement opportunities therein and provide strategic direction & thought leadership. The role provides an opportunity to lead overall business strategy providing exposure to senior stakeholders. Create and lead Transformation roadmaps in synchronization with business expansion strategy. Program manage and be accountable of the entire delivery of the Transformation Roadmap   a. Work with cross-functional teams; multiple geographies to run a common agenda for transformation & continuous improvement.   b. Continuously challenge the status-quo and come up with point-of-views that drive significant value for clients.   c. Lead a culture of Innovation and help in modernizing operations   d. Lead and implement Business Process Management System for Transitions. Essentials  :  Proven track of delivering high impact Transformation projects Prior Project management or Transformation experience with at least 5+ years of experience in Automation / Process excellence and preferably in large scale busines model Demonstrate thought leadership and risk-taking abilities  Strong Quantitative and problem-solving ability along with ability to conceptualize complex problems and develop an Analytical road map for them ' Proven experience in driving continuous improvements across teams with Design Thinking, and Automation  Excellent communication and presentation skills with stakeholder management ability to work in diverse teams and with multiple stakeholders

column2: Process Improvement Lead will work with Senior HR leaders and HR Global Process Owners to detail and document the HR global processes       Process Improvement Lead will provide consulting support to the process owners on strong process methodology, particularly with respect to articulating the purpose, outcomes, and target customers for each process and determining appropriate metrics for measuring process effectiveness and outcomes                      DISCOVER     your opportunity                           Key responsibilities of this role are:                      Documenting current processes                      Developing and delivering change and communication strategy for communicating global process standards to all of HR                      Designing and implementing a governance framework for Process Ownership                      Establishing a continuous improvement culture and methodology in HR for ongoing process improvement                      Appropriate documentation and controls for process changes, including approvals and up-/down-stream impact analysis                      Upskilling Global HR Process Owners on how to execute continuous improvement                      Establishing criteria for determining when a process should be changed                      Creating and maintaining a continuous improvement roadmap for new processes and process changes                      Cooperation with Global HR Operations and Technology Lead on myHR Journeys - an HR process workflow automation project.                      Operating as program manager for this multi-year initiative            You will report to the Human Resources Global Chief Operating Officer.                     SHARE your talent                   We re looking for someone who has these abilities and skills:                      Ability to set strategy, creativity and management skills to deliver on that strategy                      Certified Six Sigma GreenBelt (or higher) or equivalent process improvement methodology certification                      Project Management experience                      Ability to lead and influence others                      Ability to work with and influence stakeholders at senior levels of the organization (HRLT)                      Compelling communication skills

column2: RESPONSIBILITIES  ?? Strategic Planning : Develop and implement strategic plans for construction operations, aligning them with the company's overall goals and objectives. Identify opportunities for growth, improvement, and cost optimization in construction processes.  ?? Project Management : Provide leadership and guidance to project managers throughout the construction lifecycle, ensuring timely completion, adherence to quality standards, and effective resource allocation. Monitor project progress, review milestones, and address any issues or risks that may arise.  ?? Operational Efficiency : Streamline construction operations by implementing best practices, standardized procedures, and efficient workflows. Identify areas for process improvement and implement strategies to enhance productivity, quality, and safety on construction sites.  ?? Budgeting and Cost Control : Collaborate with finance and project teams to develop construction budgets, monitor expenses, and control costs. Analyze project financials, identify cost-saving opportunities, and take necessary actions to ensure projects are delivered within budget.  ?? Vendor and Contractor Management : Oversee vendor selection, negotiation, and contracting processes to secure reliable and cost-effective partnerships. Manage relationships with contractors, suppliers, and subcontractors, ensuring compliance with contractual obligations and performance expectations.  ?? Compliance and Safety : Ensure construction operations comply with relevant regulations, codes, and safety standards.  Implement and enforce safety protocols and practices to maintain a safe working environment for employees and subcontractors.  ?? Team Leadership:  Build and lead a high-performing construction operations team. Provide mentorship, guidance, and professional development opportunities to team members. Foster a collaborative and inclusive work culture that promotes teamwork, accountability, and continuous improvement.  ?? Stakeholder Communication : Establish effective communication channels with internal and external stakeholders, including executives, clients, project teams, and regulatory authorities. Provide regular updates on project status, address concerns, and manage expectations. EXPERTISE AND QUALIFICATIONS  ??Bachelor's degree in engineering, preferably in the field of oil and gas or related discipline. A master's degree is a plus.  ??Minimum 18 Years of experience in project management & operations management within the oil and gas industry, specifically in EPC/LSTK projects.  ??Strong knowledge of oil and gas EPC project methodologies, industry regulations, and safety standards.  ??Proven track record in successfully managing multiple oil and gas EPC projects simultaneously.  ??Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams in the oil and gas sector.  ??Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on operational efficiency within the industry.  ??Exceptional communication and negotiation skills, both written and verbal, with an understanding of the specific terminology used in the oil and gas field.  ??Proficiency in project management software and tools specific to oil and gas EPC projects.  ??Familiarity with relevant industry trends, technologies, and best practices in the oil and gas sector, petrochemical, chemical industries.
