column1: Plant Head/Unit Head, Production and Operations
column2: Role & responsibilities General Work Scope The Unit Head of Manufacturing is responsible for managing and coordinating operations within an apparel manufacturing factory. This role requires strong leadership to effectively manage and support the Factory Manager team in achieving production targets, maintaining quality standards, and ensuring efficient operations. The Unit Head will work closely with various departments to drive continuous improvement initiatives and foster a culture of excellence within the organization at each factory. Main Responsibilities 1.   Team Management and Leadership Leading, directing, and managing the Factory Manager team to achieve the company's goals. Conducting regular meetings with the team to identify issues, evaluate performance, and plan corrective actions. Promoting an inclusive and collaborative work culture, providing constructive feedback, and motivating the team to achieve optimal results in accordance with established targets. Encouraging structured empowerment programs from the operational level up to the senior middle management level, aimed at achieving an independent performance level that can meet the needs and challenges of the company's business operations. 2.   Operational Control and Oversight Monitoring and following the production operations in each factory, identifying barriers, and taking proactive steps to ensure that production activities are conducted well and smoothly with the use of resources that are efficient and productive according to the best planning that has been established. Conducting analysis and review on the application of the latest technology and manufacturing systems to enhance productivity and efficiency. Ensuring priority for and overseeing the machine maintenance process and all production instruments to minimize wasted time in production and control maintenance costs. Establishing comprehensive quality control policies and systems to ensure the consistency and excellence of products. Conducting regular reviews and quality inspections to identify quality issues and encourage continuous improvement efforts. Giving directions to all departments to ensure that the manufactured products meet the quality standards and buyer specifications throughout the production process. Managing and ensuring the implementation of corporate environmental, social, and governance (ESG) policies and achievement of corporate ESG goals. Overseeing and ensuring compliance with regulations, industry standards, and buyer standards in the apparel manufacturing sector for the division. 3.   Production Process Management Ensuring that order planning, production planning, and raw material planning and the execution of production processes in all factories are done well to ensure smooth production and cost efficiency. Building strategic relationships with all buyers to maintain a mutually beneficial cooperation. 4.   Analysis and Definition of Performance Standards Conducting reviews and establishing relevant KPIs for each factory and regularly measuring performance against set targets. Analyzing production data to identify trends, variability, and opportunities or needs for improvement. Providing comprehensive feedback on the performance of each factory and presenting findings to top management for evaluation and decision-making on improvements. Emphasizing that each factory should focus on using a systematic approach as the foundation of the company's operations for sustainability, resilience, and long-term business competitiveness. 5.   Strategic Planning Providing guidance in the development of long-term and short-term production plans that are based on systems, productivity, quality, and team collaboration. Analyzing order trends, market conditions, and industry expectations to help the company adapt and grow. Preferred candidate profile 1. Bachelors degree or masters degree in a related field such as Industrial Engineering, Textile Engineering, Apparel Manufacturing Engineering, or Business Administration. 2. A minimum of 10 years of experience as senior management in the garment industry, with a strong portfolio in managing factories. 3. Strong leadership and team management skills, with communication abilities, the capability to inspire and motivate teams to achieve outstanding results. 4. In-depth and detailed knowledge of garment manufacturing processes, quality standards, process standards, and production operational management principles. 5. Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a data-based approach to decision-making. 6. Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships and collaborate cross-functionally at all levels of the organization. 7. Adequate abilities in both technical and non-technical analysis in factory operations. 8. Possesses strong leadership and ethical principles in leading diverse teams. Perks and benefits As per Industry Standards Interested candidates please share your cv as under; sumeet.panigrahi@texport.com

column1: Hiring City Head Operations Antara (Max Group) Bangalore (Koramangala)
column2: About Us: www.antaraseniorcare.com   About the Organization   Who we are? Max Group is a leading Indian multi-business conglomerate with interests in the Life Insurance, Healthcare, Real Estate and Senior Care industries. Launched in 2013, Antara is a 100% subsidiary of Max India. It is pioneering the concept of Age in Place for people over 55 years of age, by developing Senior Living communities in India. The first Antara community was launched in April 2017 near Dehradun, Uttarakhand with 190 apartments spread over 14 acres of land. After our first one-of-its-kind, independent residential community at Dehradun and another at Noida, Sector-150. We are set to scale up further and carry forward the Max Group legacy of holistic care solutions with the launch of Antara Care Homes and Antara Care at Home services.    Position: City Head - Operations (Senior Care Home and Care at Home Services) Location: Bangalore Company: Antara Senior Care (Max Group) Antara Assisted care is seeking a dedicated and experienced City Head of Operations to oversee and manage our senior care homes and care at home services in Bangalore. The City Head will play a crucial role in ensuring the highest quality of care and services for our residents and clients. Key Responsibilities: - Oversee the day-to-day operations of the senior care home and care at home services, ensuring the delivery of exceptional care and services to residents and clients. - Develop and implement operational strategies and initiatives to enhance the overall quality of care and services provided. - Lead and manage teams. - Collaborate with the healthcare team to develop individualized care plans for residents and clients, ensuring their physical, emotional, and social well-being. - Maintain compliance with regulatory standards, licensing requirements, and company policies in all operational aspects. - Monitor and analyse operational metrics to identify areas for improvement, optimize efficiency, and enhance the overall resident and client experience. - Build and maintain strong relationships with residents, clients, families, and community stakeholders to promote a positive and supportive care environment. - Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance operational effectiveness, resident satisfaction, and employee engagement.  - To ensure 100% compliance with statutory, statistical and annual reports.  - Represent for all medico-legal issues. - Reports to the COO and supervises administration in the day-to-day activities - Liaises with departments for smooth running of the facility Qualifications: - Bachelors degree in healthcare administration, Nursing, or related field; master's degree preferred. - Proven experience in Hospital operations and management, with a strong track record of delivering high-quality care and services. - In-depth knowledge of senior care regulations, best practices, and industry standards. - Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate a diverse team. - Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a focus on continuous improvement. - Compassionate and empathetic approach to resident care and services. - Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. If you are a compassionate and experienced healthcare professional with a passion for senior care and a drive to deliver exceptional services, we invite you to apply for the City Head of Operations role at Antara Senior Care in Bangalore. Interested Candidates can share their resume on rajkumari@antaraseniorcare.com or WhatsApp on 7053490016.

column2: Job Description: As the Chief Operating Officer (COO), you will play a pivotal role in driving operational excellence and optimizing efficiency across various departments. Reporting directly to the CEO, you will be responsible for overseeing key operational functions including but not limited to Risk Management Services (RMS), Operations, Audit, Depository Services, Account Opening, and Margin Trade Funding etc.   Key Responsibilities: 1.  Strategic Planning and Execution:    - Develop and implement strategic plans to streamline operations and enhance overall efficiency.    - Collaborate with senior management to align operational objectives with the company's long-term goals.   2.  Risk Management Services (RMS):    - Oversee the implementation and maintenance of robust risk management processes and procedures.    - Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and internal risk policies.   3.  Operations Management:    - Lead and manage the day-to-day operations of the company, ensuring smooth functioning across all departments.    - Optimize operational processes to enhance productivity and reduce costs.   4.  Audit and Compliance:    - Coordinate internal and external audits to ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal policies.    - Implement corrective actions and preventive measures, as necessary.   5.  Depository Services:    - Oversee depository operations and ensure seamless processing of demat accounts and related services.    - Maintain strong relationships with depository participants and regulatory authorities.   6.  Technology Integration:    - Oversee the integration and maintenance of trading software systems (Class).    - Ensure regular updates and enhancements to system software to meet evolving business needs.   7.  Margin Trade Funding (MTF):    - Manage margin trade funding operations, including span margin, VAR margin, and margin reporting.    - Implement strategies to optimize margin utilization while maintaining risk controls.   8.  Client Relationship Management:    - Collaborate with client-facing teams to address operational issues and enhance client satisfaction.    - Proactively identify opportunities to improve service delivery and exceed client expectations.   Qualifications and Experience: - Bachelor's degree in finance, business administration, or a related field. MBA or equivalent preferred. - Minimum of 10 years of experience in operations management with any reputed Stock Broking Co.. - Strong understanding of risk management principles, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices. - Proven leadership skills with the ability to inspire and motivate teams towards achieving common goals. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal stakeholders and external partners.

column2: The AVP (Operations) will be responsible for overseeing the operation and maintenance (O&M) of Water Treatment Plants (WTP) and other water utility projects across India     This role demands a deep understanding of WTP operations, preventive and electrical maintenance, as well as expertise in smart water and leak detection technologies     The AVP will lead a team of engineers and technicians, ensuring efficient and effective service delivery, compliance with regulatory standards, and the implementation of best practices in the water utility sector, within cost, KPIs                 Key Responsibilities:                 Operational Management:             Oversee the daily operations of WTPs and other water utility projects across multiple locations.     Ensure consistent water quality and compliance with environmental and safety regulations.     Develop and implement standard operating procedures (SOPs) for efficient plant operations.                 Chemical Management:             Demonstrate extensive knowledge of chemicals used in water treatment processes, including coagulants, flocculants, disinfectants, and pH adjusters.     Ensure proper storage, handling, and application of chemicals in compliance with safety regulations.     Optimize chemical dosing to achieve desired water quality while minimizing costs.                 Maintenance Management:             Plan and execute preventive maintenance programs to minimize downtime and extend equipment life.     Supervise and coordinate electrical maintenance activities, ensuring all electrical systems and components are functioning optimally.     Manage the inventory of spare parts and maintenance supplies.     Optimum usage of Chemical, Manpower, Spares etc.                 Technological Implementation:             Drive the adoption and integration of smart water technologies, including IoT solutions for real-time monitoring and control.     Implement leak detection technologies to identify and mitigate water loss.                 Team Leadership:             Lead, mentor, and develop a team of engineers, technicians, and support staff.     Conduct regular performance reviews and provide training and development opportunities.     All India exposure in different states.                 Project Management:             Oversee the commissioning of new WTP projects and the decommissioning of obsolete ones.     Manage project budgets, timelines, and deliverables, ensuring projects are completed on time and within budget.                 Stakeholder Management:         Liaise with government bodies, regulatory agencies, and clients to ensure compliance and address any operational issues.     Maintain strong relationships with key government agencies such as PHED, MP Jal Nigam, Paradip Port Authority, Delhi Jal Board, and others similar Govt Agencies.     Engage with stakeholders to understand their needs and expectations, and to foster collaborative working relationships.             Continuous Improvement:             Identify areas for improvement in operational processes and implement innovative solutions.     Conduct regular audits and inspections to ensure adherence to quality standards.                 Reporting and Documentation:             Prepare and present detailed reports on plant performance, maintenance activities, and project status to senior management.     Maintain comprehensive records of all operations, maintenance activities, and incidents.                 Qualifications and Experience:                   Educational Background:       Bachelor??s degree in Engineering (Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, or related field). A Master??s degree in Engineering or Business Administration is preferred.                   Experience:       Minimum 12-15 years of experience in the operation and maintenance of water treatment plants and other water utility projects.     Proven experience in preventive maintenance, electrical maintenance, and the implementation of smart water technologies.     Prior experience in a leadership role managing large teams and multiple projects.                   Technical Skills:       In-depth knowledge of WTP operations and maintenance protocols.     Familiarity with electrical systems, SCADA, and PLCs used in water utilities.     Proficiency in using CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management Systems) and other relevant software.                           Soft Skills:       Strong leadership and team management abilities.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Ability to think strategically and solve complex problems.     Strong organizational and project management skills.             Other Requirements:         Willingness to travel frequently across India.     Strong commitment to safety, environmental compliance, and quality standards.     Ability to work under pressure and handle multiple priorities.

Manage the learning management system (LMS) and ensure its effective use in delivering online courses, managing student enrollments, and tracking student progress. Collaborate with faculty members to develop engaging and effective online course materials, ensuring alignment with the curriculum and learning objectives. Manage the recruitment, training, and performance evaluation of online instructors and support staff. Implement and maintain best practices for online teaching and learning, including the use of instructional technology and the learning management system. Monitor student progress and engagement, identify areas for improvement, and implement strategies to enhance student success and retention. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and quality standards for online education. Collaborate with other departments, such as IT, marketing, and admissions, to streamline processes and enhance the overall student experience. Stay informed about emerging trends and technologies in online education and learning management systems and recommend innovative solutions to enhance program effectiveness. Analyze data and generate reports to track key performance metrics and inform decision-making. Provide leadership and support to the online academics team and LMS administrators, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement.
column11: E-learning, Elearning Development, LMS, Online Operations, Academic Operations, Content Delivery, Edtech, Digital Learning, Edutech, online academics, Online Tutoring

column1: Operations Head For a Telecommunications & IT Multinational Company
column2: Job Description: Operations Head for a Telecommunications & IT Multinational Company Position Overview: The Operations Head will be responsible for leading and managing the company's operations, ensuring the delivery of high-quality services to clients while maintaining operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness. This role requires a strategic thinker with strong leadership skills, a deep understanding of the telecommunications and IT industry, and a proven track record of driving operational excellence. Responsibilities: Develop and implement operational strategies, policies, and procedures to ensure alignment with the company's business goals and objectives. Oversee day-to-day operations, including service delivery, quality assurance, and performance management. Lead and manage a team of operations professionals, providing coaching, guidance, and development opportunities to drive performance and engagement. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and finance, to ensure seamless integration of operations with other business areas. Monitor and analyze operational performance metrics, identifying trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Implement process improvements and technology solutions to drive operational efficiency, reduce costs, and improve service quality. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations, standards, and best practices in the telecommunications and IT industry. Develop and manage operational budgets, ensuring financial objectives are met while maintaining high-quality service delivery. Foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and customer-centricity within the operations team. Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory changes, and assess their impact on the company's operations. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field. A Master's degree or relevant professional certification (e.g., PMP, Six Sigma) is preferred. Minimum of 10 years of experience in operations management within the telecommunications and IT industry, with a proven track record of driving operational excellence. Strong leadership skills, with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Excellent strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities. Strong understanding of telecommunications and IT technologies, service delivery models, and industry trends. Demonstrated ability to manage operational budgets, financial objectives, and performance metrics. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders. Experience in implementing process improvements, technology solutions, and quality management systems. Knowledge of relevant regulations, standards, and best practices in the telecommunications and IT industry. Proven ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic, and matrixed environment, with a strong customer-centric focus. By joining our team as the Operations Head, you will have the opportunity to lead and shape the future of our operations, driving innovation, efficiency, and growth in a rapidly evolving industry. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing the opportunity further.
column11: with experience in managing and developing high-performing teams. Excellent strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities. Strong understanding of telecommunications and IT technologies, SMS, IT Project Management, IT Operations, IT Projects

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION  Job Details Position TitleOperations Head (G6/G7)Company   Reporting to Cluster Function Sub-Function   Purpose As the Operations Head, you will oversee and optimize all aspects of our company's operations to ensure efficiency, productivity, and profitability. Your leadership and strategic vision will drive operational excellence and support the organization's growth objectives.  Key Responsibilities Develop and implement operational strategies to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and reduce costs. Oversee day-to-day operations, including production, logistics, supply chain management, and quality control. Lead cross-functional teams to achieve operational targets and deliver exceptional results. Establish and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track operational performance and drive continuous improvement initiatives. Collaborate with senior management to align operational objectives with overall business goals. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, safety standards, and company policies. Manage vendor relationships and negotiate contracts to optimize cost-effectiveness and quality of services. Drive innovation and implement technology solutions to enhance operational effectiveness.   Knowledge and Experience Education Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, Engineering, or related field. Master's degree or MBA preferred. Experience At least 15 years of progressive experience in operations management roles, preferably in manufacturing, logistics, or related industries. Proven track record of success in optimizing operations, driving process improvements, and delivering results in a fast-paced environment. Language Skills  Proficiency in English (written and verbal) is required. Communication Clear and effective communication skills to articulate goals, expectations, and priorities to team members and stakeholders. Decision-Making Sound judgment and decision-making skills to prioritize tasks, allocate resources, and mitigate risks. Change Management Proven experience in driving organizational change and managing transitions to drive continuous improvement. Technical Expertise Solid understanding of operations management principles, lean methodologies, and relevant technologies to optimize processes and systems. column2: The Center Manager is responsible for overseeing the operations and overall management of a designated center or facility      They play a vital role in ensuring the efficient functioning of the center, maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction, and achieving business objectives      The specific responsibilities and duties may vary depending on the nature of the center, such as a fitness center, community center, educational institution, or healthcare facility            However, the following job description provides a general overview of the role:      Operational Management:        Develop and implement operational policies, procedures, and protocols to ensure smooth day-to-day operations of the center.      Manage the facilitys resources effectively, including personnel, equipment, supplies, and budgetary allocations.      Ensure compliance with health, safety, and security regulations, as well as any applicable legal requirements.      Coordinate with various departments or teams within the center to streamline workflows and optimize efficiency.      Staff Leadership and Development:      Recruit, train, supervise, and evaluate center staff members, fostering a positive and productive work environment.      Delegate tasks and responsibilities, provide guidance and support, and promote teamwork among employees.      Conduct regular staff meetings, training sessions, and performance reviews to facilitate professional growth and enhance employee performance.      Customer Service and Relations:      Ensure exceptional customer service by maintaining a welcoming and helpful atmosphere within the center.      Address customer concerns, inquiries, and complaints promptly and effectively, striving to exceed their expectations.      Develop and implement strategies to attract new customers and retain existing ones, focusing on customer satisfaction and loyalty.          Financial Management:          Develop and manage the centers budget, including revenue generation, expense control, and financial reporting.      Identify opportunities for revenue growth and cost optimization, making data-driven decisions to achieve financial targets.      Monitor financial performance, analyze variances, and implement corrective actions as necessary.      Marketing and Promotion:      Collaborate with marketing or public relations teams to create and execute marketing campaigns, advertising initiatives, and promotional events.      Utilize various channels, such as social media, websites, newsletters, and local partnerships, to raise awareness and drive traffic to the center.      Maintain a strong presence in the local community, building relationships with key stakeholders and identifying partnership opportunities.      Strategic Planning:      Develop long-term strategic plans and objectives for the center, aligning them with the overall organizational goals.      Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, assess competition, and adapt strategies accordingly.      Monitor industry developments and best practices to identify opportunities for innovation and improvement.      Qualifications and Requirements:      A bachelors degree in business administration, management, or a related field is preferred.      Proven experience in a managerial or supervisory role, preferably in a similar industry or setting.      Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills to effectively manage a diverse team and interact with customers, staff, and stakeholders.      Excellent organizational and problem-solving abilities, with a keen attention to detail.      Sound financial acumen and the ability to interpret and analyze financial data.      Proficiency in using computer software and systems relevant to the position.      Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required by the centers operating hours.
column11: Public relations, Financial reporting, Customer satisfaction, Social media, Finance, Strategic planning, Healthcare, Market research, Customer service, Operations

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION Job Title:  Operations Head Location:  Kolkata (On-site) Role Overview: As the Operations Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of lead generation, fostering connections and partnerships with schools, executing marketing strategies, and ensuring the efficient operation of the center. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Lead Generation: - Develop and implement strategies to generate leads for the center. - Utilize various channels such as digital marketing, events, and networking to attract potential clients. - Analyze market trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities for lead generation. 2.  Connections and School Tie-Ups:   - Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with schools and educational institutions.  - Collaborate with school administrators and educators to establish partnerships and promotional opportunities. 3.  Marketing:  - Develop and execute marketing plans to increase brand awareness and drive enrolment.  - Utilize both online and offline channels including social media, email campaigns, print materials, and events to reach target audiences.  - Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics to optimize campaigns and maximize ROI. 4.  Center Operations:  - Oversee day-to-day operations of the center, ensuring smooth functioning and exceptional customer service.  - Manage staffing needs, including recruitment, training, and scheduling of personnel.  - Implement efficient processes and procedures to streamline operations and enhance productivity.  - Maintain a safe and welcoming environment for students, staff, and visitors.     Qualifications and Skills: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field  - Proven experience in lead generation, business development, and marketing, preferably in the education sector. - Strong networking and relationship-building skills. - Excellent communication and negotiation abilities. - Ability to multitask, prioritize, and thrive in a fast-paced environment. - Leadership qualities with a focus on team collaboration and development.
